divs: Sighting DetailsI had been in meditation for six hours on Sunday, May 5, 2012. I went outside to sit by my garden to watch the sun set. I need proof of things and do not like to take the stories of UFO phenomenon at face value. I need to see to believe. I'm a show-me kind of girl. I had been trying my hand at telepathic communication with my star family in my meditation for several hours to no avail. Having given up I went outside to sit by my garden and watch the sun set. I looked directly above me and noticed three toroidal distortions as energy patterns in the twilight sky. I had read about the ability among some UFO's to cloak by bending light around themselves. I spoke directly to the largest and closest one. I spoke to it for 10 minutes explaining that I needed to see it to believe it. Exasperated, I finally said I did not wish to be eaten alive by mosquitoes and started to get up to go inside. In a flash of bright white light it decloaked for just a second so I could see it. It lit up the whole sky. It must have been relatively close at 500 feet or more. I said to it, "OK, I believe you."
Summary: 3 toroidal stationary energy patterns observed, made telepathic communication, challenged it to decloak. One did for a split second with a bright white flash as I asked it to prove it was there.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Worthington
There were no other sightings in Worthington on or around May 5th 2012
